column3: Physical Intervention: Escort Time Out Room: :55
column4: 1:55-3:15 became agitated when he wanted a marker under his desk. He became very frustrated when the marker fell on the floor. He flopped to the floor and layed there. He became verbally and physically aggressive. Support was called and escalated. He stood up and began charging staff attempting to hit and kick them. He began to grab weapons to hit staff with (pencil
column5: water bottle). Support utilized an escort to the TO room to keep Holden safe. was in TO until dismissing to the bus.

column3: Student was outdoors in the adjacent playground/park area. He was physically aggressive towards writer and his assigned 1:1 TA. He would periodically swat and then attempted to grab his 1:1 TA
column4: so writer and 1:1 implemented an emergency 30 second 2 person child restraint (standing). Student dropped so staff let go and eventually processed him into the PAS room.

column3: Student flopped to the floor screaming and kicking staff
column5: hitting and scratching himself on the face
column7: picking up pencils and pens trying to stab staff yelling
column8: "The plan is to stab and hurt when I'm angry. After targeting staff multiple times

column3: X became upset in the classroom when he realized he missed a portion of the show on the Smartboard. Staff offered him offered the choice to re-watch it in the science lab or on his laptop. He continued to escalate and pulled all of the computer cords out. He also tried to hit/push/pull the computer When staff tried to block
column4: he became physically aggressive. Staff utilized an escort to the t/o room. Dismissed from there.
